name: Pavlov's playground
description:
Can be played with both keyboard (and mouse for UI) and any controller that is considered a gamepad (ps4, xbox One, xbox 360 and switch)

Controls:

ControllerKeyboardmeaningleft joystick
arrow keys
movement of the characteryellow
Wbark
rednothing (easy) | reset (hard)
greenjumpbluedash

The game output from the keys A, S, D on the keyboard and east, west and south on your gamepad might differ from level to level.
